<h5>Random Number</h5>
======================



<pre><code>
# Create a  directory
mkdir rand-number 
  
# Change into the directory
cd rand-number

# Install the package     
npm i rand-number --save
</code>
</pre>


#Add To your js File

<pre><code>
    const randNumber = require('rand-number');
    console.log(randNumber(5, 10));
</code>
</pre>
